text: Chu zhenzhu wai, tamen chongbai na dui tamen ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi, tamen shuo: Zhexie (ouxiang) shi zai zhenzhu nali ti women shuo qing de. Ni shuo: Nandao zhenzhu bu zhidao tiandi jian you ci shi, er yao nimen lai gaosu ta ma! Zanmei zhenzhu, ta chao hu wanwu! Ta chao hu tamen zai ta zhi wai suo chongbai de dongxi!
